mapper.select: SELECT id , name , created_date , created_by , modified_date , modified_by FROM bake.scheduler_option_group WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bake.scheduler_option_group ( id , name , created_date , created_by , modified_date , modified_by ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL('bake.seq_scheduler_option_group') , #{name} , to_char(current_timestamp , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , 'system' , to_char(current_timestamp , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , 'system' )

INSERT INTO bake.scheduler_option ( id , application_id , name , value , group_id , created_date , created_by , modified_date , modified_by ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL('bake.seq_scheduler_option') , #{application_id} , #{name} , #{value} , #{group_id} , to_char(current_timestamp , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , 'system' , to_char(current_timestamp , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , 'system' )
